subject: Re: Advertisements on MetroRehab careers page
preview: Hi Rica  I have reviewed the MetroRehab website link containing the uploaded adverts.  Approved. No changes. Thank you.  Nick  Nick Edwards  General Manager / Director of Clinical Services  275 Addiso

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:

I have reviewed the MetroRehab website link containing the uploaded adverts.

Approved. No changes. Thank you.

Nick

I wish to pay my respects to the traditional custodians and all Aboriginal community elders and people, past and present on whose lands I live and work.

Hi Nick, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: https://www.metrorehab.com.au/about-us/employment/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Hi All

Only suggested change to all advertisements would be to remove the Closing date: XX Month 2021, as these are rolling adverts.

I don't want to confuse applicants with expired closing dates.



Thanks Nick



Nick Edwards

General Manager / Director of Clinical Services
